name: Copycat (itch) (Mavelan)
description:
Play on fullscreen for better experience.

If your game is lagging, try another browser!

Copycat is a short puzzle platformer game with a twist. Get to the bowls while controlling both cattos with just one set of controls.

Made for the Mini Jame Gam #12.

Controls:

[W] [A] [S] [D] or [↑] [←] [↓] [→]  to move and jump

[SPACE] to jump

[R] to restart the level

Estimated Time to Beat:

Under 15 minutes

 How does this game fit the theme?

The cats you control are upside down. 

How did you implement the special object?

 What's a telephone? Is that some kind of a cactus? Because we have those... 

Credits:

  • Mavelan
  • LaIQ (website)

You won't be disappointed :)
